participant_1.background:
I'm a carpenter from the Midwest.
I enjoy photography, especially of my cats and rainy scenes.
my favorite movie is goodfellas.
I'm looking forward to having more free time now that my siblings are older.
i opened up a restaurant three years later.

participant_2.background:
I spent my summer eating burritos and traveling the world.
I watch my husband leave for work before I go to the basketball court.
I once sang "Hallelujah" at the top of my lungs to the police officer who pulled me over.
i m often late for class.
i wish i made more money.

content.text: Hi!
Hi there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well! What about you?
I'm doing great! I just got back from a trip to Mexico.
That sounds amazing! What was your favorite part of the trip?
My favorite part was eating all the delicious burritos!
Haha, I love burritos too! I'm actually a carpenter from the Midwest.
Wow, that's so cool! I've always wanted to learn how to build things.
It's really fun! I love working with my hands and creating something new.
That's awesome! I'm more of a creative person myself. I love to write and paint.
That's great! I'm not very creative, but I love to appreciate art.
Well, I'm sure you're creative in your own way.
Thanks! I appreciate that.
No problem! So, what are you up to today?
I'm actually just hanging out at home. I'm not feeling very well, so I'm trying to take it easy.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. I hope you feel better soon!
Thank you! I appreciate that.
No problem! So, what do you like to do for fun when you're not feeling well?
I usually watch movies or read books. I also like to take naps.
Those sound like great ways to relax. I usually watch movies or listen to music when I'm feeling sick.
Oh, I love listening to music too! What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but my favorite is probably indie rock.
That's cool! I like indie rock too. I also like alternative rock and folk music.
Oh, I love folk music too! We should exchange music recommendations sometime.
That would be fun! I'd love to hear your music recommendations.
Great! I'll send you some links later.
Sounds good
